name: Pirates from the Future
description:
A co-op game of seafaring and cannon shooting made in 48h by Bilou, Pixel-boy, Rémy, Elisée, Dorian, Métylene, Shqiptar and Fraxken for the Fantastic Game Jam with Superpowers, the HTML5 game maker.

Controls

The game is best played with gamepads! Alternatively, player 1 can play with WASD, H and J and player 2 can use the arrow keys with NUMPAD1 and NUMPAD2.
